meta.description: A customizable widget for streamers that displays FACEIT player statistics on your stream!
generator.testing: You are currently using an experimental version.
generator.description: FACEIT Stats Widget is a free and open-source widget for streamers. It allows you to display your statistics directly on your stream. It is easy to set up and has a lot of customization options.
generator.experimental.help: This option is experimental and it might not work correctly.
generator.footer.not_affiliated: This project is not affiliated with
generator.settings.title: Settings
generator.settings.auto_width.help: Automatically sets the recommended width. If disabled, the widget can be freely resized.
generator.settings.only_official_matches: Only official matches count (don't count matches played on hubs)
generator.settings.save_session: Store statistics for two hours after closing the widget
generator.settings.save_session.help: If enabled, the player stats (ELO difference, matches won/lost) will reset after two hours of inactivity. If disabled, player stats will reset instantly after closing the widget.
generator.settings.player_not_found: This player does not exist or has never played Counter-Strike 2 on FACEIT.
generator.theme.title: Style
generator.theme.custom_css.title: Custom CSS URL
generator.theme.banner_as_background.no_: Player {{0}} has no profile banner set.
generator.theme.banner_as_background.rea: A high banner opacity may make the text unreadable.
generator.theme.adjust_opacity.requireme: Requires OBS Studio version 31.0.0 or newer.
generator.generate.title: Generate
generator.generate.info.0: Copy this link and paste it into a browser source in OBS Studio.
generator.generate.info.1: It is recommended to set browser's width to 500px.
generator.preview.title: Widget preview
generator.stats.title: Statistics
generator.stats.disabled: Statistics are disabled. You can enable them in the "Settings" tab.
modals.generated.title: Widget generated
